title: Focus on oil
creator_credit: Derek Mayne, Frank Wells and Granada Productions
brief_description: Shows the vast operation of oil prospecting and production carried on to answer increasing world demands. Illustrates the work of explorers and technicians who find and exploit oil resources. Also shows some of the main oil-fields, pipe-lines and refineries of the world, and some everyday uses of oil.
